ALAS2-2023-2029

Amazon Linux 2 Security Advisory: ALAS-2023-2029
Advisory Release Date: 2023-04-27 18:37 Pacific
Advisory Updated Date: 2023-05-02 19:19 Pacific
Severity: Important
References: CVE-2022-44370 
FAQs regarding Amazon Linux ALAS/CVE Severity
Issue Overview:

NASM v2.16 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow in the component quote_for_pmake() asm/nasm.c:856 (CVE-2022-44370)


Affected Packages:

nasm


Issue Correction:
Run yum update nasm to update your system.

New Packages:
aarch64:
    nasm-2.15.03-3.amzn2.0.2.aarch64
    nasm-rdoff-2.15.03-3.amzn2.0.2.aarch64
    nasm-debuginfo-2.15.03-3.amzn2.0.2.aarch64

i686:
    nasm-2.15.03-3.amzn2.0.2.i686
    nasm-rdoff-2.15.03-3.amzn2.0.2.i686
    nasm-debuginfo-2.15.03-3.amzn2.0.2.i686

noarch:
    nasm-doc-2.15.03-3.amzn2.0.2.noarch

src:
    nasm-2.15.03-3.amzn2.0.2.src

x86_64:
    nasm-2.15.03-3.amzn2.0.2.x86_64
    nasm-rdoff-2.15.03-3.amzn2.0.2.x86_64
    nasm-debuginfo-2.15.03-3.amzn2.0.2.x86_64
